events.do: let price = 0; let priceFix = "ЦенаFix"; let priceDynamic = "ЦенаDyn"; let priceService = "ЦенаSer"; let inputLength = $("input[name=metal_jacket_length]").val(); for (let i = 0; i < item.parameters.length; i++) {let parameter = item.parameters[i]; if (parameter.name === priceFix) {priceFix = parseFloat(parameter.value); } if (parameter.name === priceDynamic) {priceDynamic = parseFloat(parameter.value); } if (parameter.name === priceService) {priceService = parseFloat(parameter.value); } } if (inputLength === undefined) {inputLength = 1000; } else { if (inputLength < 50) { inputLength = 50 } if (inputLength > 100000) { inputLength = 100000 }  } let lenghtForOne = inputLength / 1000; price = (priceFix + (priceDynamic * lenghtForOne)) + priceService; $("input[name=metal_jacket_price]").attr('value', price);
